name: Explorer Ultra Blue
about: Fragrance Family:.Scent Type:.Key Notes:Italian Bergamot, Marine Accord, Leather.Fragrance Description:Montblanc Explorer Ultra Blue is a citrus-marine-woody scent for him built around a marine accord with notes of violet leaf, lemon, bergamot, juicy-pink peppercorn, patchouli, tonka bean, and leather accord. It’s inspired by the crystal-blue lakes found within Switzerland’s mountain ranges.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (Sd Alcohol 39-C), Parfum (Fragrance) Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Bht, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, Citral, Citronellol, Coumarin, Eugenol, Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool, Ci 60730 (Ext Violet 2), CI 42090 (Blue 1).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Hold the bottle 12 inches from your chest, neck, or wrist and spritz twice. .-You can spray a comb and run it through your hair to make the scent last even longer.

shades.shade_name: 2 oz/ 60 mL Eau de Parfum Spray
3.4 oz/ 100 mL Spray Eau de Parfum
